title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7336.6 - Religious dietary laws
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7336.6 - Religious dietary laws

State Regulations

Youth are entitled to observe reasonable dietary laws
established by their religion. Each facility shall provide youth with food
items reasonably sufficient to meet such religious dietary
laws. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7336.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
